First of all, there's no such a prelim books exist. Yes, NCERTs are base of a building named “UPSC". For prelim you should focus on facts and current news especially. It will help you a lot. Complete all NCERTs and revise them multiple times.

No NCERT Books & prelims books are not the same but you can say that NCERT books is very helpful in the preparation of prelims exam Because NCERT books build your foundation (base). So I can say that you face very much difficulty if you directly go for standard book
